name: FlashScope
overview:
FlashScope was created by Flash developers for Flash developers and designers. The main feature of the website is that FlashScope is an open to any contributions community CMS (content management system). Each member has an ability to influence the quality of the content.

FlashScope users can submit links to relevant resources and articles, take part in forum discussions and create blog entries that may combine text, images and links to other blogs and web pages. The most active members get the status of experts and obtain the right to add pages, moderate forum messages and comments, blog posts and other articles.

FlashScope is a great source of information that has already united thousands of Flash professionals all over the world. Everyone may join the community to create new social networks for common interests and passions and to stay up-to-date.
